channel.title: Request : infinite prayer [PI], Game modes, Weapon speeds
channel.description:
im currently using the source rsskills [PI] and am looking to add a way for an item[ex: comp. cape] to give infinite pray when worn, i am also looking for a way to add game modes which offer differing xp rates, and drop rates depending the mode, and a sure fire way to speed up weapons, i've tried differing the returns and to little or no success.
so this is my requests and thanks for reading. im new to coding so please be gentle.

item.title: Request : infinite prayer [PI], Game modes, Weapon speeds
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“wywy, post:1, topic:439834”]im currently using the source rsskills [PI] and am looking to add a way for an item[ex: comp. cape] to give infinite pray when worn, i am also looking for a way to add game modes which offer differing xp rates, and drop rates depending the mode, and a sure fire way to speed up weapons, i’ve tried differing the returns and to little or no success.

so this is my requests and thanks for reading.
im new to coding so please be gentle.[/quote]

Depends on server,

if (playerEquipment[playerCape]==ID) { drainRate=0; -OR- prayerDrain=false; -OR- find out how it drains yourself and stop it? :o }

Read full topic

item.title: Request : infinite prayer [PI], Game modes, Weapon speeds
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

This is for item giving inf pray well its not exactly infinite but close enough here u go search switch(itemid) in itemassistant.java and paste this ase ase ####: c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[5] = 99999; c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); return; change the #### to item id hope this helps

Read full topic
